<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Cancel Fraud Marker"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/anti-fraud/{fraudMarkerId}/cancel"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Cancels a fraud marker.

It can be performed by the participant who created the fraud marker.

A fraud marker created as result of [closing](#operation/dict-hub-infraction-report-close-v2) a infraction report can be canceled by the counterparty participant, who closed the infraction report.

### Idempotence
The operation is idempotent. If the registration has already been canceled with the same parameters,
a response equivalent to the first request will be returned.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"fraudMarkerId","description":"The Fraud Marker id.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
